combatbooster.settings.enableMarker.hint: Enable a marker that will be displayed on the current combatant
Enable a marker that will be displayed on the next combatant. The marker will be a greyscale version of the current combatant's marker.
combatbooster.settings.enableStartMarker: Enable a marker that will be displayed on the position where the combatant starts the turn.
combatbooster.settings.markerPath.name: Turn Marker Image
combatbooster.settings.markerPath.hint: Image to be displayed as turn marker
combatbooster.settings.startMarkerPath.h: Image to be displayed as start turn marker
combatbooster.settings.markerSpeed.hint: Rotation speed of the turn marker
combatbooster.settings.markerScale.hint: Scale multiplier for the turn marker
combatbooster.settings.markerIgnoreScale: Ignore the token scale, use just token width and height for the marker size
combatbooster.settings.enableHud.hint: Display recent actions in the token hud
combatbooster.settings.hudRecent.hint: How many recent items to display
combatbooster.settings.hudMaxCol.hint: Maximum number of columns to display, set to 0 for auto
combatbooster.settings.markDefeated.hint: Automatically mark an npc defeated when it reaches 0 hit points
combatbooster.settings.moveToPile.hint: When an npc is defeated move it to the body pile. Top left corner by default - place a token named 'pile' anywere to pile the bodies there instead
combatbooster.settings.panCamera.hint: Automatically pan camera to current combatant (For Players, only pan on visible tokens)
combatbooster.settings.controlToken.hint: Automatically select a token when it's their turn
combatbooster.settings.ignorePlayer.hint: Ignore the player tokens when auto selecting
combatbooster.settings.renderTokenHUD.hi: Enable a token's hud when it's their turn (GM only)
combatbooster.settings.soundPath.name: Your Turn Sound
combatbooster.settings.soundPath.hint: Play this sound when it's a player's turn. Leave empty for no sound
combatbooster.settings.displayNotificati: Display a notification when it's a player's turn
combatbooster.settings.currentHp.hint: Data path for an actor's current hp
combatbooster.settings.maxHp.hint: Data path for an actor's max hp
combatbooster.settings.markerAbove.name: Turn Marker Above
combatbooster.settings.markerAbove.hint: Display turn marker above the token
combatbooster.settings.targetAbove.name: Target Pips always above marker
combatbooster.settings.targetAbove.hint: Display target pips above the turn marker
